document.full_text: following in the footsteps of the alabama house of representatives, the state senate on thursday passed a measure to crackdown on illegal immigration, bringing the measure close to becoming law.
document.title: alabama nears final approval of immigration crackdown
lines_and_colors: following in the footsteps of the alabama house of representatives, the state senate on thursday passed a measure to crackdown on illegal immigration, bringing the measure close to becoming law.
